name: lD38
description:
"What Do You Mean The Planet Is In Danger

And All I Have Is This Deck Of Cards?

What Am I Supposed To Do?!?!"

Our Game entry for Ludum Dare 38 :D Hope you enjoy!

The Web version has some bugs but seems to only happen on certain browsers so I would check out the .exe which hasn't produced anything weird (so far) :)

Recommend Screen settings for .exe version is 800x600 since I designed it to be a browser game :p

Credits:

  • We did everything except for the music!
  • @chaos_l2eaper : Programming
  • @itsdrell : Programming / Art
  • Music from edtijo found here

Included Unity Project but I wouldn't try and learn anything from it (fast and dirty code)

Since this is a Jam game, if you find any bugs, let us know!
